block.p: RUBEN--Ilse. Loving wife of Fred S. Ruben, deceased, beloved mother of Jane Guttman. Adored grandmother of Jennifer and Catherine. Special grandmother-in-law of Robert Schlau and Christopher Guttman - McCabe. Devoted great-grandmother of Steven and Alexa Schlau and Anna and Abigail Guttman-McCabe. The service will be held at 12:30 on January 31 at Schwartz Memorial Chapel, 11403 Queens Blvd, Forest Hills, NY. In lieu of flowers contributions may be sent to the American Heart Association or a charity of your choice.
